alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Henderson, southeastern Gibson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Huntingdon, Three Way, Atwood, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Medina, Trezevant, Gibson, McLemoresville, Howley, Hickory Flat, Tuckers Corner, Cedar Grove, Cades, New Enterprise, Ledbetter, Juno and Leach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
